tags.description: Flush toilets with warm water showers in family campground. Vault toilets in group campground.
tags.name: Morris Hill Campground

tags.description: Those who enjoy the solitude of an isolated and remote location will be drawn to Greenwood Point Campground. With no road access, the adventure is just getting there! Strap on that pack and take the 3.3 mile hike, or paddle a canoe directly to the shores
tags.name: Greenwood Point Campground
